All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationType  
    InsertionBatcherContext
    Captures the inputs and context needed for constructing a MarkLogicInsertionBatcher.
    MarkLogicAnyMetadataResolver
    MarkLogic "Any" OutputTypeResolver implementation for the basic operations that always return an AnyType, since MarkLogic may return any object type like an XML, JSON, Binary, Text, RDF, etc.
    MarkLogicConfiguration
    This class represents an extension configuration, values set in this class are commonly used across multiple operations since they represent something core from the extension.
    MarkLogicConnection  
    MarkLogicConnectionInvalidationListener
    Created by jkrebs on 5/17/2019.
    MarkLogicConnectionProvider
    This class (as it's name implies) provides connection instances and the functionality to disconnect and validate those connections.
    MarkLogicConnectionType  
    MarkLogicConnector
    This is the main class of an extension, is the entry point from which configurations, connection providers, operations and sources are going to be declared.
    MarkLogicConnectorException  
    MarkLogicConnectorSimpleErrorType  
    MarkLogicExecuteErrorsProvider  
    MarkLogicExportListener  
    MarkLogicInsertionBatcher
    Created by jkrebs on 9/12/2018.
    MarkLogicMimeType  
    MarkLogicOperations
    This class is a container for operations, every public method in this class will be taken as an extension operation for the MarkLogic MuleSoft Connector
    MarkLogicQueryFormat  
    MarkLogicQueryStrategy  
    MarkLogicResultSetCloser
    Closes a MarkLogicConnection once it has been processed
    MarkLogicResultSetIterator
    Iterates across all results returned by a synchronous QueryDefinition execution.
    MarkLogicSelectMetadataResolver  
    RecordExtractor
    Intent is for a dependent to hold onto an instance of this to avoid re-instantiation of the Jackson ObjectMapper.
